string.text: Locate a set of gunsmith tools for Cardan so he can perform basic upgrades on your gear.

I need some new tools. The shit I have to work with was scavenged and rusted out to begin with, and now they're pretty much useless. If I could get at least a basic gunsmith toolkit, I could continue to repair weapons and gear and maybe even do some upgrades.
I'll keep an eye out for you.

I know somewhere you might be able to find some, if you don't mind digging through a bunch of scrap and rubble. I'll mark the location on your map. If you find any tools there, bring them back to me. I'll pay you for the trouble and I'll be able to upgrade your gear.
Great, these are just what I need. Thanks stalker. Take this as a reward, and come see me if you want to upgrade your gear. With these tools I'll be able to do a lot more than I used to.
Cardan needs a set of technician's tools to perform advanced upgrades to your gear. He knows the location of a stash where some may be hidden.
Your gear has a lot of potential. I know how to upgrade it but I would need the right tools. If you can find me a set of technician's tools I could do you a lot of good.
It's the middle of the Zone man, technician's tools don't just spawn in anomalies.

Sasha Hunter has a set stashed away. I don't know what the hell he's holding on to them for, he couldn't fix a bent noodle. The bastard never paid me for some repairs I did for him, why don't you go collect his tools for me to settle the debt. I'll pay you for the service and I'll be able to upgrade your gear even further.
Fantastic! Feel free to stop by any time for a drink or if you need me to take a look at your gear.
Cardan can fully upgrade your gear if you can bring him a set of armorer's tools. A certain Bandit is currently known to be in possession of some.

I have a lot of parts around here that could fully upgrade your gear but I would need a set of armorer's tools to install them. I know where you might be able to find such tools, if you don't mind getting your hands a little dirty.
So where can I find them?

I got word a group of Bandits just raided a Military supply depot and one of them found a full set of armorer's tools. I can show you where they were headed. Now, I doubt they're going to just hand over such valuable loot because you asked nicely, but if you should find a way to get them for me, I'll pay you for them and be able to fully upgrade your gear.
Great! Now I'll be able to perform almost any upgrade to any piece of equipment. Thanks stalker, take this as a reward.
